isis.stitle: TSI 96-01-02R - Removal and Installation of Huckspin Huck Bolt® Fasteners

subjectgroup.subject: Removal and Installation of Huckspin Huck Bolt® Fasteners

geninfo.para: Effective approximately April 1, 1996, International started using Huckspin Huck Bolt fasteners to assemble the frame and fasten components to the frame, from the rear of the cab to the rear of the frame on 92/93/9400 Model vehicles. Eventually, the entire frame will be assembled with Huckspin Huck Bolt fasteners.

International has released a supplement to S01001 FRAME (CTS-5007T), part of the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual that explains the removal and replacement of the Huckspin Huck Bolt, and the tools required to perform these procedures. The supplement was distributed to all subscribers to the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual approximately May 1, 1996.
